sources.name: taxi_trip_data_input1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~>  taxi_trip_data_input1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared taxi_trip_data_input1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://makadf001.blob.core.windows.net/mycontainer/SampleData/trip_data_1.csv"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = TripData
in
  Source;
